main.name: Micheal A Aderinto
main.description: Product Management by Day, Founder && Freelancer by Night.
main.bio: My name is Micheal, I'm an aspiring full-stack developer. I want to help small businesses and entrepreneurs bring their ideas to life. Basically, I turn your requirements into reality on time and on budget.
main.contactmessage: If you have an application you are interested in developing, a problem that needs solving or a project that needs rescuing, I'd love to help you with it.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Micheal must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
